name: School-Based Initiative
description: LYRIC’s School-Based Initiative is a model of bringing LYRIC’s 30 years of expertise with LGBTQQ youth directly into SFUSD school communities. SBI’s Q Groups support BIPOC middle and high school queer, transgender, gender nonconforming, and questioning youth in the school setting through structured group programming addressing issues such as identity, relationships, and queer sexual health. howToGetIt: If you or someone you know is interested in joining a high school Q Group, connect with the Wellness Center at the school site. For Middle School, connect with the school’s Social Worker. For more information about Q Groups from LYRIC, please contact SBI Team via sbi@lyric.org
